1.12.2.1.9.0:
Basic support for Waila, Hwyla, and TheOneProbe.
Debug screen support.
Fix for #16 Compost progress bar rarely goes over right side of GUI.
1.12.2.1.8.7: Make mod name more unique - Canny Composter
1.12.2.1.8.6: Another crash fix for CompostBinCap.getItemInSlot abstract
1.12.2.1.7.0: Better IItemHandler support, fixes faster Food Funk rotting in Composter.
1.12.2.1.6.0: Flowers, melons, and mushrooms compostable. Library update. Custom named compost bins stay named.
1.12.2.1.5.0: Compost bin functionality converted to capability. Bug fixes.
1.12.2.1.4.0: More compostables from other mods listed. Library update.
1.12.2.1.3.0: Compost use effect.  Metadata and oredict support for compost item config field.  Added advancement.
1.12.2.1.2.0: Added item configuration and many more compostable items
